QuestData.Title: Commando Drop
QuestData.Description: Are you sensitive to the tremors of the local ley-lines, $n? I can feel the occasional thrum, like the plucking of a string. It's the kind of resonance I'd expect from a long-range summoning spell. The Lorekeepers in Talrendis, with their laughably primitive magics, are trying to summon in backup from Darnassus.$B$BWe can use this to our advantage, $n. If you can compromise their summoning stone, we can teleport a crack team of commandos behind enemy lines.$B$BLocate the summoning stone in Talrendis!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 5 Talrendis Lorekeepers and locate a Lorekeeper Summoning Stone somewhere within Talrendis Point.
QuestData.RewardText: Images of a great and distant tree flood your mind. Your stomach lurches as you reorient the stone, briefly filling your senses with visions of a fiery portal, a towering mountain, a frigid wasteland, and a terrible scar across the earth.$B$BAfter a moment, the magical energies of the stone calm, and you feel you are but a step away from Valormok. Andorel's invasion can begin...
